dmca.title: University of Liverpool Alleges Infringement on Site with "links to offensive materia
dmca.body:
[private]
      
The University of Liverpool [private], Liverpool, L69 3BX    

THE UNIVERSITY of LIVERPOOL
    
FAX
                                          Date 30/10/2002
                                          Number of pages including cover 
                                          sheet: 3
    
                                          From: [private]
                                                [private]
                                                [private]
                                          Phone: [private]
                                          Fax phone: [private]
To:
  [private]
  Google Inc.
  Phone:
  Fax phone: [private]
    
REMARKS:   Urgent, Please comment

Copyright infringement claim attached

Many thanks

[private]


[private]
    
                                   THE UNIVERSITY
                                    of LIVERPOOL
    
[private]
30 October 2002
    
[private]
Director of Administrative Services 
    
[private]
[private]
Liverpool L69 3BX
    
Telephone: [private]
Facsimile: [private]
Email: [private]
    
1.  Identify in sufficient detail the copyrighted work that you believe has been infringed.
    
http://www.liv.ac.uk/ - Using the University corporate logo and passing off as 
related to:
The University of Liverpool
    
http://www.liv.ac.uk/University/study_at_liveroool/fees.htm

http://www.liv.ac.uk/University/study_at_liverpool/apply.htm

http://www.liv.ac.uk/medicine/

2.  Identify the material that you claim is infringing the copyrighted work listed in item #1 above.
    
    http://www.lluniv.org/
    This site is using copyright [sic] material of The University of Liverpool 
without permission. Material used includes the University logo, text and images from various pages of the University of Liverpool website as listed above, and passing off as being related to The University of Liverpool. The site has links to offensive material. Their continued availability may damage our reputation and business.
    
    Search Query:         Liverpool university
    Infringing Web Pages: http://www.lluniv.org - ranked at 9 in search results
    
3.  Provide information reasonably sufficient to permit Google to contact you (email address is preferred).
    
    [private]
    [private]
    [private]
    [private]
    [private]
    Liverpool
    England
    L69 3BX

    Telephone: [private]
    Fax:       [private]
    Email:     [private]
    
    University Switchboard
    Telephone: [private]
    Facsimile: [private]
    
[private]
    
                                       -2-
    
4.Provide information, if possible, sufficient to permit Google to notify the
owner/administrator of the web page that allegedly contains infringing material 
(email address is preferred).

As far as we can ascertain, the owner appears to be:
    
Domain Name: LLUNIV.ORG
Administrative Contact and Technical Contact:
    
[private]
[private]
MOSCOW, RU 203252
RU
[private]
    
5. Statement:
 
I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

6. Statement:

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is 
accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

7. Signature:
    
8. Document faxed to Google, Inc. [private], Attn: [private], [private], 

29 October 2002.
